thig12.1:1.1_0: “I’m a water-carrier. Even when it’s cold,
thig12.1:1.2_0: that you always plunge into the water,
thig12.1:1.3_0: I fear I’ll get the stick from noble ladies,
thig12.1:1.4_0: harassed by fear of abuse and anger.
thig12.1:10.1_0: “I have been on the wrong path,
thig12.1:10.2_0: and you’ve guided me to the noble path.
thig12.1:13.1_0: you won’t be freed from suffering,
thig12.1:13.2_0: though you fly away and flee.
thig12.1:14.1_0: Go for refuge to the Buddha,
thig12.1:14.3_0: Ethics are the word of ethical conduct,
thig12.1:16.1_0: I used to belong to the brahmin caste,
thig12.1:16.2_0: today I truly am a brahmin!
thig12.1:16.3_0: I am master of the three knowledges, accomplished in wisdom,
thig12.1:16.4_0: I’m a scholar and a bathed initiate.”
thig12.1:18.1_0: The Book of the Sixteens is finished.
